pkgmetadata.longdescription: # parse_pip_search__Wrapping the needs of a "pip search" command necessity through PyPi.org, on a command-line parseable output__## Installation & UsageInstall with `pip install parse_pip_search`Use with `parse_pip_search anything`You can specify sorting options : - `parse_pip_search -s name`- `parse_pip_search -s version`- `parse_pip_search -s released`## Dependencies* bs4* rich* requests## Based on [@victorgarric](https://github.com/victorgarric)'s awesome [pip_search](https://github.com/victorgarric/pip_search) utility
